reviewText: The Manhole: Masterpiece Edition is a kids' game, yeah, but it's chock full of wonder and the scope is enthralling. Like Spelunx, I just can't put my finger on why I'm so intrigued by this game, but there's something that draws me to explore it and interact with everything. Maybe it's the sheer age of the game combined with its sheer uniqueness. Also, the Myst making-of easter egg video is fascinating. This game is well-ported and can probably run on anything, so you have no excuse not to give it a try.

reviewText: It should take less than an hour to explore the variety of mystic places in The Manhole alongside interacting with all the different creatures and surroundings. This point-and-click adventure offers no objectives, yet is full of rich detail and interactivity. Several good scores of music and a hidden video of The Making of Myst are also included. Even after 25+ years, The Manhole offers a level of thoroughness that many modern point-and-click adventures lack.

reviewText: There is really no point to the game and no real story. The game is for those that like to explore. Its a simple click here and there game to see what happens when you click on certain things. While on your exploration you will run into unique creatures that will put a smile on your face when you meet them. The game is more geared towards children and how they like to explore. The game is great for any parent wanting to entertain a child for a period of time. I highly recommend getting this game in pack with other games and get it for creativity of this exploration world that you get tossed into. I loved playing it and exploring the many areas of this game.

reviewText:
I was on the streets alone and addicted to crack...i was slipping away from reality.  Then I found Manhole....changed my life.  It was installed on a library computer.  Floppy disk.  It was love at first site.  The unfound glory unto which brought me back from the brink of destruction.  The indepth story line and amazing character development made me whole again.  I love everything about this game....I LOVE YOU MANHOLE.  MAAAAAAAANHOOOOOLEEEEEE

MANHOLE IS LOVE
MANHOLE IS LIFE
MANHOLE....IS MY PRECIOUS

10/10 would play this game again
